import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import*as THREE from'three';import{OrbitControls}from'three/examples/jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js';import{GUI}from'dat.gui';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Planner(){const mountRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const mountNode=mountRef.current;// Store the initial ref value
if(!mountNode)return;const scene=new THREE.Scene();const camera=new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(45,window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight,1,10000);camera.position.set(0,20,100);const renderer=new THREE.WebGLRenderer();renderer.setClearColor(0x0ebee6);renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight);renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);renderer.shadowMap.enabled=true;renderer.shadowMap.type=THREE.PCFSoftShadowMap;mountNode.appendChild(renderer.domElement);const controls=new OrbitControls(camera,renderer.domElement);controls.enableDamping=true;controls.dampingFactor=0.1;controls.enableZoom=true;// Ground plane
const geometren=new THREE.PlaneGeometry(15000,15000,100,100);geometren.rotateX(-Math.PI/2);const material2=new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({color:0x00aaff,roughness:0.6,metalness:0.1});const plane=new THREE.Mesh(geometren,material2);plane.receiveShadow=true;scene.add(plane);// Lighting
const ambientLight=new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff,0.5);scene.add(ambientLight);const directionalLight=new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff,1);directionalLight.position.set(5,10,7);directionalLight.castShadow=true;directionalLight.shadow.mapSize.width=2048;directionalLight.shadow.mapSize.height=2048;directionalLight.shadow.camera.near=0.5;directionalLight.shadow.camera.far=100;scene.add(directionalLight);// GUI controls
const gui=new GUI();const waveSettings={amplitude:10.0,frequency:10.0,speed:2,color:0x00aaff};gui.add(waveSettings,'amplitude',0.1,100.0);gui.add(waveSettings,'frequency',0.5,50.0);gui.add(waveSettings,'speed',0.1,30.0);gui.addColor(waveSettings,'color').onChange(value=>material2.color.set(value));// Wave Animation
function animateWave(time){const positions=geometren.attributes.position.array;const uTime=time*0.001*waveSettings.speed;for(let i=0;i<positions.length;i+=3){const z=positions[i+2];positions[i+1]=Math.sin(z*waveSettings.frequency+uTime)*waveSettings.amplitude;}geometren.attributes.position.needsUpdate=true;geometren.computeVertexNormals();renderer.render(scene,camera);requestAnimationFrame(animateWave);}animateWave();const handleResize=()=>{camera.aspect=window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight;camera.updateProjectionMatrix();renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight);};window.addEventListener('resize',handleResize);// Cleanup
return()=>{window.removeEventListener('resize',handleResize);controls.dispose();gui.destroy();renderer.dispose();if(mountNode)mountNode.removeChild(renderer.domElement);scene.traverse(object=>{if(object.geometry)object.geometry.dispose();if(object.material)object.material.dispose();});scene.clear();};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:mountRef});}export default Planner;
